modName: Fus Ro Dah - Realistic Unrelenting Force
summary:
DESCRPITION

Have you ever felt powerless although you're Dragonborn? Have you ever felt enemies just won't get any damage from the mighty Fus Ro Dah?
Don't Worry, This mod makes Unrelenting Force shout more powerful and your enemies can't even touch you.
descriptionHtml:
Fus Ro Dah - Realistic Unrelenting Force


DESCRPITION

Have you ever felt powerless although you're Dragonborn? Have you ever felt enemies just won't get any damage from the mighty Fus Ro Dah?
Don't Worry, This mod makes Unrelenting Force shout more powerful and your enemies can't even touch you.

Now enemies actually gets impact damage.

As reguested now every word FUS, RO and DAH has own impact damage factor:

FUS - +30% = Kill Every Citizen Instantly!

RO - +50% = Make large amount damage to armored enemies.

DAH - +100% = You're unbeatable

(Depending on Difficulty level)

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=256311189
author: douglasadams
